author: dreid
msg: Fix the css from my earlier commit
Add ability to have map display a single person
Add panning & zooming to show a particular region of the world (presently
just US and Europe) - suggested by Toby Atkin (toby at atkin-wright dot com)
Add link to show individuals positions on map
I couldnt find a suitable icon to use (was thinking of a globe)
so this is just a boring text link presently. Offers of an icon

author: niallp

author: dain
msg: Encapsulated Castor specific code into a CastorCmpEngine

CmpEngine implementation is created with a pluggable CmpEngineFactory specified with a property of the same name and the default being org.apache.openejb.alt.containers.castor_cmp11.CastorCmpEngineFactory
